attributes.action: Give the police any powers they require or request to make our streets safe.
attributes.background: Give the police any numbers or powers they request to make our streets safe again, I'm a law abiding citizen and have nothing to fear from the police, give the police any numbers or powers they request to make the criminals fear.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what powers you'd like the police to be given. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
